publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology "

msIdentifier.repository: Wroblewski Library of the Lithuanian Academy of Sciences in Vilniuse, Lithuania

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Song of Songs 7
ab.l: Qajtḥyn qajtḥyn ol t́uǵaĺč́a qajtḥyn qajtḥyn da ḱoŕajik śeni ne ḱoŕaŕsiź t́uǵaĺč́ada nečik tańecińd́a ol ėki avullarnyn.
Ńe ḱorḱĺud́urĺar atlamlaryj ėt́akĺar byla ǯomart qyz č́uv́ŕasi butlaryjnyn ḥalḥalar kibik iši qollarynyn ustanyn.
Kińdigij kruɣu kibik ol ajnyn ėksiĺmidir ol vina qursaɣyj üḱĺanḿagi kibik budajlarnyn qoralanɣan giĺaflik- ĺar byla.
Ėki t́oš́ĺarij śeniń kohen da navi ėki soɣaɣalar kibik ėkiźaḱĺari jurńuń.
Bojnuj śeniń v́eźasi kibik ol fil tišiniń ḱoźĺarij lotoklar kibik Ḥešbondan qabaɣy qatyna B́et́ Rabimniń bur- nuj v́ežasy kibik ol Ĺevanonnun qarejdir jüźĺariń Daḿešekniń.
Bašyj üśt́ujd́a Karḿeĺ kibik da kikili bašyjnyn ipkiń kibik bij t́uv́umč́ukĺańǵań t́oš́av́ĺu śoźĺarińa uslularnyn.
Ńe ḱorḱĺu bolduj da ńe č́eb́ar bolduj čydaɣanyj üč́uń juǵuń galutnun śuv́ar- lik ašajiš́ĺar byla.
Bu turušuj ukšady ḥurma t́eŕagińa da t́oš́ĺarij bij da kohen solqunlarɣa.
Ajttym mińajim ḥurma t́eŕa- gińa tutunajim butaḥlaryndan da bolsunlar ėńdi t́oš́ĺarij solqun- lary kibik ol borlalyḥnyn da ijisi burnujnun almalar kibik.
Da tanlajyj ol jaḥšy vina kibik Tora śoźĺari baradoɣon śuv́ari- ḿa t́uźĺuḱĺarǵa śoźĺat́adir ėrińĺariń juqlavčularnyn.
Ḿeń išanamyn śuv́ar T́eńriḿa da üśt́uḿa śuv́arligi ševaɣatlarynyn.
Kel śuv́arim čyɣajyḥ ol t́uźǵa qonajyḥ kanforlarda.

Tunlej turajym baḥčalarɣa ḱoŕajim jašardymo ol borlalyḥ jetiĺdimo ol jetilḿagiń jemiš́ č́eč́akĺańdiĺarmo ol narlar ḱoŕup jaḥšy iš- ĺarijni b́erirmiń jaḥšy b́erńaĺarimni saja qajttyryp śeni aziź jerija.
Qaruv qajtaradyr uma T́eńrisińa ol jaɣadalar b́erdiĺar ijiś da ėšikĺarimiź üśt́uńa bar ijiśli jemiš́ĺar janɣyjlar daɣy qartlar śuv́ar T́eńrim astradym saja.

app.note: Marked with bold square letters as the beginning of the chapter 7 (as it is in Catholic translations). However, it is SoS 6.13. in Hebrew Bible.
